casebody.data:
No. 368,

Misc.

Board of Regents of the University of Texas et al. v. Goldberg, U. S. Circuit Judge, et al. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, George M. Cowden, First Assistant Attorney General, J. C. Davis, W. O. Shultz II and James C. McCoy, Assistant Attorneys General, and A. J. Carubbi, Jr., on the motion. David R. Richards for Gilmore et al., in opposition.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus and/or prohibition denied.
